description: Olga Lyubimova knows about film and TV production, but once apparently admitted loathing many art forms.
title: Does Russia's new culture minister hate the arts?
title_page: Does Russia's new culture minister hate the arts? - BBC News
maintext: The last entry in the Kropalik blog on the LiveJournal platform was in 2010. It has not been verified by the BBC and the culture ministry has yet to comment.
